abstract: Honduran authorities report two gunmen fatally shot indigenous environmental activist Nelson Garcia, associate of recently murdered indigenous group leader Berta Caceres, but claim crimes are unrelated.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen killed Nelson García, a colleague of the environmentalist leader Berta Cáceres, who was slain almost two weeks ago under similar circumstances.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Honduras: Activist’s Colleague Is Killed

snippet: Gunmen killed Nelson García, a colleague of the environmentalist leader Berta Cáceres, who was slain almost two weeks ago under similar circumstances.
